title: [Large-Scale] Digital-Based Medical Language Education Course Design Scenarios

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Experience with Digital Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Mobile device-based language education course for undergraduate students preparing for healthcare careers. Strengthening applicability to medical settings by combining digital resources and traditional learning methods in a blended learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize 200 core medical terms in context-specific scenarios within four weeks
Learners can improve communication skills by participating in medical simulation content at least three times weekly via a mobile platform
Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in feedback processing skills through peer assessment activities on a digital discussion board
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
